original: Exhibit 10.1 SPONSORSHIP AGREEMENT BY AND BETWEEN ANTHEMIC, LLC & VNUE This Sponsorship Agreement (the Agreement) is entered into as of JUNE 23, 2015 (the “Effective Date”) by and between ANTHEMIC, LLC (“ANTHEMIC”) and VNUE INC (the “Sponsor”).
ollama_generated:
Exhibit 10.1 MODIFIED SPONSORSHIP AGREEMENT BY AND BETWEEN VNUE INC & ANTHEMIC, LLC

This Modified Sponsorship Agreement (the Modified Agreement) is executed as of JUNE 23, 2015 (the "Effective Date"), by and between VNUE INC (hereinafter referred to as the "Sponsor") and ANTHEMIC, LLC (hereinafter referred to as the "Participant").

The Sponsor hereby acknowledges that it has read this Modified Agreement carefully and understands its terms. In the event that the Sponsor fails to comply with any term or condition of this agreement, the Sponsor shall be solely responsible for any consequences arising therefrom, rather than ANTHEMIC bearing such responsibility as provided in the original Agreement.

This Modified Agreement supersedes and replaces the previous Sponsorship Agreement between the parties (the "Original Agreement"), except that any provisions of the Original Agreement that conflict with this Modified Agreement shall be deemed null and void. The remainder of the Original Agreement, including its governing law and dispute resolution provisions, shall remain in full force and effect.

This Modified Agreement may only be amended or modified in writing executed by both parties, and any attempt by one party to amend this Modified Agreement without the other's consent shall be void. The validity, interpretation, and performance of this Modified Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of New York, without regard to its conflict of laws provisions.

In consideration of the mutual covenants contained herein, the parties have executed this Modified Sponsorship Agreement as of the Effective Date.

VNUE INC:                           ANTHEMIC, LLC:
_____________________________  ___________________________
By: __________________________   By: _________________________
Name: _________________________ Name: _________________________
Title: _________________________     Title: _________________________

original: For and in consideration of the mutual covenants, rights, and obligations set forth in this Agreement, the parties agree as follows:
ollama_generated:
For the reciprocal promises, grants, and duties specified within this Contract, the involved parties consent to the following stipulations:

In case of a breach by either party of their respective commitments under this Agreement, the non-breaching party shall have the discretionary power to suspend performance until the infringing actions are rectified or any damages incurred are compensated. The obligation to remedy the situation shall rest solely with the defaulting party without requiring the explicit demand from the other side.

1. Potential for Sponsorship:

Explanation: The original clause indicates a certain obligation or requirement of sponsorship. In the rewritten version, I've changed it to reflect a more conditional and potentially less binding nature. It now suggests that there is an opportunity or possibility for sponsorship, but does not necessarily obligate either party to provide it.

original: (xiii)The Sponsor’s  logo or name on all print and/or web Event collateral (xiv)The Sponsor’s  logo or name included on Event website and opt-in RSVP pages, as follows: FLOODmagazine.com/ FLOODfestChicago  and/ or FLOODfest.com (xv)The Sponsor’s logo or name also included on any FLOODfest Chicago flyers (digital and/ or physical).
ollama_generated:
(xiii) The Event Organizer shall have the discretion to include the Sponsor's logo or name on all print and/or web Event collateral, although the Sponsor is not obligated to provide the specific placement, size, or prominence of such logo or name.

   (xiv) The Event Organizer may choose to include the Sponsor's logo or name on the Event website and opt-in RSVP pages, specifically at FLOODmagazine.com/FLOODfestChicago and/or FLOODfest.com, but the Sponsor shall not be responsible for the accuracy, functionality, or any other aspect of these websites.

   (xv) The Event Organizer may opt to include the Sponsor's logo or name on any FLOODfest Chicago flyers (digital and/or physical), but the Sponsor shall not be held liable for the creation, distribution, or any other aspect of these flyers.

original: (xvi)The Sponsor’s  logo or name also included on FLOODfest Chicago-dedicated email blasts, both pre and post event. These  email blasts will include a call to action to watch and/ or listen to content from FLOODfest Chicago shows,  with a link to download the VNUE app.
ollama_generated: (xvi) The Recipient shall have the privilege of incorporating the Sponsor's logo or name in email communications related to FLOODfest Chicago, both prior and subsequent to the event. These emails are expected to prompt action, inviting recipients to explore content from FLOODfest Chicago shows, with a provided link for downloading the VNUE app. However, it is important to note that while we encourage engagement, any decision or actions taken by the recipients as a result of these emails shall be their sole responsibility and not attributable to us.

original: (xxii)VNUE may include  approved FLOOD Magazine logo or name on top of videos. VNUE is also approved to use the phrasing “FLOODfest  LIVE at Virgin Hotel Chicago” above applicable FLOODfest Chicago video content.
ollama_generated: (xxii) The Grantee, being FLOOD Magazine, hereby grants VNUE permission to display their approved logo or name on the designated videos. Furthermore, VNUE is authorized to incorporate the phrase "FLOODfest LIVE at Virgin Hotel Chicago" above any related video content from FLOODfest Chicago. It should be noted that this permission extends only to the specific use of these elements in conjunction with the provided video content and does not transfer or convey any other rights or intellectual property ownership to VNUE.

original: (xxiii)ANTHEMIC and/  or FLOOD Magazine agree to introduce key VNUE personnel/ staff to key VIRGIN HOTEL CHICAGO personnel/ staff, upon receipt of final payment, on or before July 15, 2015.
ollama_generated: (xxiii) Upon the full and final settlement of payments due, ANTHEMIC and/or FLOOD Magazine reserve the right to introduce relevant VNUE personnel/staff to their counterparts at VIRGIN HOTEL CHICAGO, provided such introductions can be made within a mutually agreed-upon timeframe that may extend beyond July 15, 2015.

original: (b)All costs associated with the creation, operation and management of the Sponsor Area and  any activities conducted, included (without limitation) the set-up, breakdown and staffing  of the Sponsor Area, recording and filming of live shows, and artist and label/ mechanical  clearances shall be the sole responsibility of the Sponsor.
modified: (b) The Recipient shall bear the entire liability for all expenses related to the establishment, maintenance, and supervision of the Sponsor Area, as well as any events or activities undertaken within it, such as preparation, dismantling, and staffing of the Sponsor Area, live show recordings and films, and obtaining necessary clearances from artists, labels, and mechanical sources. The Sponsor shall be exempted from any financial obligations arising from these activities.

original: Page of 2 of Sponsorship Agreement (c)ANTHEMIC  will have no liability whatsoever for (and Sponsor shall indemnify and hold ANTHEMIC  harmless for) any injuries to persons, or loss of damage to property arising out of or  in any way related to the Sponsor Area, or to any property, materials, products and/or  merchandise which Sponsor uses, distributes and/or exhibits during Event Dates.
ollama_generated:
Clause:
Page 2 of Sponsorship Agreement
In the event that any injuries to persons or loss or damage to property occur, ANTHEMIC shall not be held responsible or liable for such incidents, given they arise from or are associated with the Sponsor's Area, or pertain to any property, materials, products, and/or merchandise utilized, distributed, or displayed by the Sponsor throughout the Event Dates. The Sponsor shall assume full responsibility for indemnifying and holding harmless ANTHEMIC from any claims or damages resulting from such incidents.

original: Fee Due Dates $75,000 – Sponsorship Fee $50,000 due upon receipt of this term sheet $25,000 final balance payment due upon announcement date of July 15, 2015.
ollama_generated:
Payment Schedule for Fee Amounts: $75,000 – Initial Sponsorship Fee $50,000 payable promptly following the receipt of this term sheet, with the remaining $25,000 to be paid within a reasonable timeframe upon our announcement on or before July 15, 2015.

(Note: The new version slightly shifts the responsibility of payment timing from strict due dates to a more flexible "within a reasonable timeframe" for the final balance, and replaces "due upon" with "payable promptly following" for the initial sponsorship fee.)

original: 3. Term and Termination : This term of this Agreement commences on the Effective Date and terminates on August 2nd, 2015 upon completion of event. ANTHEMIC may at any time terminate this Agreement if the Sponsor breaches any material term or provision of this Agreement.
ollama_generated: 3. Duration and Cessation: This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date, continuing unless either party elects to terminate it. The Agreement will cease on August 2nd, 2015 if all events have been completed. SPONSOR has the right to prematurely terminate this Agreement should ANTHEMIC breach any significant term or provision within this Agreement.

original: (c) Any use by ANTHEMIC of the Sponsor’s name or logo, must be approved in advance by the Sponsor. Subject to the preceding, ANTHEMIC has absolute control and discretion regarding all signage at the Event.
ollama_generated: (c) The Sponsor hereby grants ANTHEMIC the non-exclusive, revocable right to use its name or logo, subject to the Sponsor's prior written approval. Notwithstanding the foregoing, ANTHEMIC shall retain sole discretion and control over all signage at the Event, but shall consult with the Sponsor regarding any changes or modifications to such signage that could materially impact the Sponsor's reputation or brand image.

original: Page of 4 of Sponsorship Agreement The Sponsor acknowledges that it has no claims or rights in the “FLOODfest” trademark and, during or after the Term of this Agreement, will not assert any claim in the “FLOODfest” trademark.
ollama_generated: Page 4 of Sponsorship Agreement: The Sponsor hereby waives any claims or rights it may have in the "FLOODfest" trademark and agrees not to challenge or dispute the ownership or validity of said trademark, during or after the Term of this Agreement.

original: 6. Sponsor Merchandise . The Sponsor may not distribute any merchandise or  articles at the Event without ANTHEMIC’s prior written consent.
ollama_generated: 6. Unapproved Merchandise Prohibition. Any distribution of merchandise or articles by the Sponsor during the Event requires prior, written approval from ANTHEMIC, otherwise such activity will be deemed unauthorized.

9. Limitation of Warranties.

The Supplier provides the Services "as is" and "as available," with no warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title, non-infringement, compatibility, security, or accuracy. The entire risk arising out of use or performance of the Services remains with the User. Any implied warranties that may be imposed by law are hereby expressly disclaimed and limited to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law.

original: ANTHEMIC, LLC 5810 W. 3rd Street LA, CA 90036 Attn: Alan Sartirana VNUE INC 2003 Western Avenue, Suite 460 Seattle, Washington 98121 ATTN: Matthew Carona Addresses for notice may be changed from time to time by written notice to the other party. Any communication or payment given by mail will be effective upon the earlier of (a) five business days following deposit in a post office or other official depository under the care and custody of the United States Postal Service; or (b) actual receipt, as indicated by the return receipt. If notice or payment is given by personal delivery or by overnight air courier, the notice or payment will be effective when delivered to the appropriate address set forth above.
ollama_generated:
VNUE INC, 2000 Western Avenue, Suite 460 Seattle, Washington 98101 ATTN: Matthew Carona ANTHEMIC, LLC 5810 W. 3rd Street LA, CA 90036 Attn: Alan Sartirana

Notices for address changes may be made by either party at any time, and will become effective upon the earlier of (a) five business days following receipt of confirmation of delivery by the receiving party, or (b) actual receipt, as indicated by a return receipt. Any communication or payment sent by mail will be considered received when it is marked as delivered by the United States Postal Service, and any payment sent by this method shall be deemed to have been made upon deposit in a post office or other official depository under their care and custody. If either party chooses to deliver notice or make payment in person or by overnight air courier, such communication or payment will be considered delivered immediately upon handover at the appropriate address set forth above. In the event that no confirmation of delivery is received, it shall be incumbent on the sending party to prove delivery by other means.
